name: Food Reviewer The Video Game
description:
Step into Tyler's shoes for a day and become the food reviewer! You'll be able to explore Tyler's house and neighborhood, eat (and review) every food he's ever reviewed, and play Cooking with Tyler mini-games!

Will it be a buy?? Play to find out!!

Features

  • Classic remarks such as "bursts in ya mouth"
  • Drive around town
  • Hang out with the Stoppies crew
  • Say "hi" to Chris (not The Food Reviewer)
  • Sniff
  • Yell "Tequila!"
  • Cooking with Tyler
